name: Snail Gale
description:
Your name is Gale and you turn into a snail every 10 seconds. Find a way to escape the lab without getting caught!

Gale can outrun the guards and open doors. Snail Gale can crawl in the vents, but will die if he transforms in the vent.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • E to interact with vents and doors
Tools Used:
  • Godot
  • Gimp
Font:

Neuropol

Authors:
  • Ryan Macumber - Art, Music, SFX
  • Trevor Tomlin - Programming
